group_1.narration: "Are you okay?@Hang on, I'll be right there."

group_1.textRight: I had no idea you were a Magical Girl too,@Ikumi!

group_1.textLeft: That's what I should be saying. Since when@have you been a Magical Girl?

group_1.textRight: Umm... It was quite a while ago.
I think...it was before you entered high@school?
How many years ago was that? I'm not great@at calculating these kinds of things.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:305301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wha?! Th-that long ago?!
(Yumi became a Magical Girl...)
(That means she must've had a wish she@wanted granted.)
(I had no idea she had something on her@mind back then...)
(I was so focused on myself.)
(Wait a second...)
(That was when I was discouraged that I was@failing all of my auditions...)
(Yumi cheered me up.)
(Right after that, I got the job at the maid@cafe...)
(Like it had been planned all along...)
(Yumi started coming home later around then,@too...)
(I thought she had volleyball practice, but@was she actually...?!)
Yumi...did you become a Magical Girl for@me?
Because I was feeling down?
Did you become a Magical Girl because you@wished for me to pass my audition?
Yumi...!

group_1.textRight: I became a Magical Girl because I was@frustrated.

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean?

group_1.textRight: "More people just need to realize how amazing@you are."

group_1.textLeft: Yeah. Your words inspired me to keep trying.

group_1.textRight: Obviously, I know you're talented, Ikumi.
But I was frustrated that other people didn't@realize it.

group_1.narration: "Please let Ikumi meet someone@who sees how amazing she is, and who@will open doors for her to become an idol."

group_1.textLeft: You didn't wish for me to become an idol.

group_1.textRight: Because I believe you'll become an idol if@you just have the right opportunity.

group_1.textLeft: Yumi...
Actually... I was tempted, too.
I thought about asking Kyubey to make me an@idol.
But I knew that wasn't right.
I knew I had to do it with my own talent.

group_1.textRight: Hmm... Maybe I shouldn't have made that wish@then, huh?

group_1.textLeft: No, no!
It's thanks to you that I found a place where@I can shine.
So, I used my wish to protect that place.

group_1.narration: That's when I had the thought.
Yumi's dream...is the dream I'm chasing now.
It was a very special dream@that was coming true@through both of our wishes!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you for the opportunity, Yumi.
We became Magical Girls to make our dreams@come true, didn't we?

group_1.narration: We were two peas in a pod, who became@Magical Girls to pursue our dreams...
Back then, it made me really happy.
I thought we had something precious,@sharing our Witch hunting problems@and chasing our dreams, together.
But...@Reality wasn't as kind as I thought.
